Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In these articles people can expect to see significant changes in Australia's public service and gas industry as a result of the new federal budget. There will be a focus on rebuilding the public servant workforce and reducing outsourcing in the government sector. Additionally job creation and improved wages will be a prominent feature of the budget announcement with forecasts for real wages growth set to increase but not seeing that growth until next year. Finally there is commentary on the potential impact of the budget initiatives on the Australian economy highlighting the ongoing challenges posed by COVID-19.
